name: Bard
starting_equipment_notes: Choose A or B: (A) Leather Armor, 2 Daggers, Musical Instrument of your choice, Entertainer's Pack, and 19 GP; or (B) 90 GP

name: Barbarian
skill_choices: Choose 2: Animal Handling, Athletics, Intimidation, Nature, Perception, or Survival
starting_equipment_notes: Choose A or B: (A) Greataxe, 4 Handaxes, Explorer’s Pack, and 15 GP; or (B) 75 GP

name: Cleric
skill_choices: Choose 2: History, Insight, Medicine, Persuasion, or Religion
starting_equipment_notes: Choose A or B: (A) Chain Shirt, Shield, Mace, Holy Symbol, Priest's Pack, and 7 GP; or (B) 110 GP

name: Druid
skill_choices: Choose 2: Animal Handling, Arcana, Insight, Medicine, Nature, Perception, Religion, or Survival
starting_equipment_notes: Choose A or B: (A) Leather Armor, Shield, Sickle, Druidic Focus (Quarterstaff), Explorer's Pack, Herbalism Kit, and 9 GP; or (B) 50 GP

name: Fighter
skill_choices: Choose 2: Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Athletics, History, Insight, Intimidation, Persuasion, Perception, or Survival
starting_equipment_notes: Choose A, B, or C: (A) Chain Mail, Greatsword, Flail, 8 Javelins, Dungeoneer’s Pack, and 4 GP; (B) Studded Leather Armor, Scimitar, Shortsword, Longbow, 20 Arrows, Quiver, Dungeoneer’s Pack, and 11 GP; or (C) 155 GP

name: Monk
weapon_proficiencies: Simple weapons; Martial weapons with Light
skill_choices: Choose 2: Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, or Stealth
starting_equipment_notes: Choose A or B: (A) Spear, 5 Daggers, Artisan's Tools or Musical Instrument, Explorer's Pack, and 11 GP; or (B) 50 GP

name: Paladin
skill_choices: Choose 2: Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Persuasion, or Religion
starting_equipment_notes: Choose A or B: (A) Chain Mail, Shield, Longsword, 6 Javelins, Holy Symbol, Priest's Pack, and 9 GP; or (B) 150 GP

name: Ranger
skill_choices: Choose 3: Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, or Survival
starting_equipment_notes: Choose A or B: (A) Studded Leather Armor, Scimitar, Shortsword, Longbow, 20 Arrows, Quiver, Druidic Focus (sprig of mistletoe), Explorer's Pack, and 7 GP; or (B) 150 GP

name: Rogue
weapon_proficiencies: Simple weapons; Martial weapons with Finesse or Light
skill_choices: Choose 4: Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, or Stealth
starting_equipment_notes: Choose A or B: (A) Leather Armor, 2 Daggers, Shortsword, Shortbow, 20 Arrows, Quiver, Thieves' Tools, Burglar's Pack, and 8 GP; or (B) 100 GP

name: Sorcerer
skill_choices: Choose 2: Arcana, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Persuasion, or Religion
starting_equipment_notes: Choose A or B: (A) Spear, 2 Daggers, Arcane Focus (crystal), Dungeoneer's Pack, and 28 GP; or (B) 50 GP

name: Warlock
skill_choices: Choose 2: Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Investigation, Nature, or Religion
starting_equipment_notes: Choose A or B: (A) Leather Armor, Sickle, 2 Daggers, Arcane Focus (orb), Book (occult lore), Scholar's Pack, and 15 GP; or (B) 100 GP

name: Wizard
skill_choices: Choose 2: Arcana, History, Insight, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, or Religion
starting_equipment_notes: Choose A or B: (A) 2 Daggers, Arcane Focus (Quarterstaff), Robe, Spellbook, Scholar's Pack, and 5 GP; or (B) 55 GP
